review: Very much friendly & explained each & every aspect of the ailments and it's recovery*  * ***** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** *********** ******* * recommends all to check up him, if anyone suffered from knee problems.

** ****** ********** I visited for worsening neck pain, radiating pain to arm. He said there must be nerve bulging issue if we do further tests, and I will get tensed by seeing the results.. instead just do physio .. I was extremely disappointed with such an experienced doctor ****** ********** **** ******* *** *** ******* ** ******** ********. 
I would not recommend him for cervical treatment atleast..
The doctor is very experienced and well spoken. My father is patient of aplastIc anemia and he explained really well if we should take further step or not
Always in a hurry. No patience to listen. Doesn't give even 7-8 minutes time to listen and answer doubts or queries. However, he is a soft spoken gentleman.
Bunch of mismanaged lot.no point in taking an appointment when we have to wait for such a long time.
